alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 28 at 1:06AM PDT until March 28 at 2:00PM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 2000 FEET... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM PDT WEDNESDAY ABOVE 2500 FEET... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory above 2000 feet, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 to 7 inches. For the second Winter Weather Advisory above 2500 feet, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Northwestern Mendocino Interior and Northeastern Mendocino Interior Counties. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 2 PM PDT this afternoon. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to 9 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northwestern Mendocino Interior
